name: Santa Barbara Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here for one week with my husband who works in Milan. This hotel is right in the heart of the Business sector - ideal if you are there for work but there is not very much to do if you are on holiday.
reviews.title: Perfect for Business - Not for Leisure!

reviews.text: Most of the eateries/bars close at the weekend as the huge office blocks are closed and all their customers have gone home so it can be a bit deserted.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel with very nice personnel
Good hotel close to airport
reviews.text: The Hotel itself is very well kept with helpful, friendly staff and very nice rooms. The food is not up to much and there is not a great choice. Breakfast is also a bit of a non-event, but then that can be the case in Italy.

aka: Santa Barbara Hotel Milan, Italy - San Donato Milanese
